message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase this high-quality product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to let it go for $120.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. While I appreciate the opportunity, $120 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now.  Would you be open to $90?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. However, I've got to make a profit on this sale. I can do $110, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit. However, $110 is still a bit outside my budget.  I'm willing to go up to $105.  Let me know if that works for you.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can do $108, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. It's a great deal for you, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
